name: NIPE Outcome
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the Newborn and infant physical examination outcomes simple reference set (foundation metadata concept). Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Newborn and infant physical examination outcomes simple reference set (foundation metadata concept) subset' with subset original id 991211000000105;.
